description:
[EuroPython 2024 — Forum Hall on 2024-07-12]

Sprint orientation
https://ep2024.europython.eu/session/sprint-orientation

What is a sprint? 
Where are they going to take place?
Can I even join? And how?

Let us answer these questions and a few more in the Sprint orientation
